name: Forests of Forever
description: Captain Burnham and Kyheem are on a mission to help environmentally ravaged worlds, using the Kwejians' unique abilities. Can you help convince the owners of these worlds it's time to let them heal?
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Booker, M. Burnham, Kyheem, or Flotter will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Booker, M. Burnham, Kyheem, or Flotter
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Crusher
featured_crew.flavor: Without hesitation, Crusher opens fire on the masked bounty hunters that have infiltrated the SS Eleos XII to protect her son.

featured_crew.name: Booker
featured_crew.flavor: According to Kwejian tradition, Booker performed the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his nephew Leto, when a boy becomes a man.

action.name: A Boy Only Becomes A Man Once

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Burnham
rewards.flavor: Stepping up as captain of the Discovery, Burnham is ready to face future challenges.

rewards.name: Crusher
rewards.flavor: Without hesitation, Crusher opens fire on the masked bounty hunters that have infiltrated the SS Eleos XII to protect her son.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Crusher
rewards.flavor: Without hesitation, Crusher opens fire on the masked bounty hunters that have infiltrated the SS Eleos XII to protect her son.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

adventures.name: Control Group
adventures.description: Conduct a study on Kwejian itself.

adventures.name: Not All But Many
adventures.description: Identify how many Kwejians are capable of helping.

adventures.name: Light from Within
adventures.description: Observe the pattern that appears on Kwejians' foreheads.

rewards.name: Booker
rewards.flavor: According to Kwejian tradition, Booker performed the Ikhu Zhen ceremony for his nephew Leto, when a boy becomes a man.

action.name: A Boy Only Becomes A Man Once

rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "Kwejian is healed... but after what I helped do to it for so long, it doesn't feel like enough. Michael thinks we could help other worlds, but I'm not so sure."

"I know you can. I've seen Book do it. If you really want to make amends to your people, to yourself, you have to make bold moves. If the Kwejian could help heal other worlds out there, it could mean more allies for you, maybe even Federation membership someday."
"Let's not get ahead of ourselves, Captain. You two show me the Kwejian can do this--heal other worlds--without it backfiring, and then we'll get to work."
"I'm no scientist, but I've got eyes. More than that, I can feel the life we could bring back to these worlds. I'm game, Michael. What's next?"

responses.text: "I'm certain we could convince them. We've got science behind us."
"Why give them a choice? Heal now, ask forgiveness later."

screens.text: "Unfortunately, it looks like politics. We've got the will and a way to help, but a number of factions aren't so enthusiastic about accepting it."
"When you've gotten used to your damaged world, rebuilt your lives around that damage, it's hard to see changing that as an upside."
"I'm no politician either, but that's going to seriously backfire. You can't roll into town and tell people how it's going to be. That makes you conquerers, not allies."
"Diplomacy is the order of the day. We're going to show the Cardassians, the Dominion, even the Ferengi that healing these worlds is the right path forward."
"I'm no scientist, but I've got eyes. More than that, I can feel the life we could bring back to these worlds. I'm game, Michael. What's next?"

responses.text: "I'm certain we could convince them. We've got science behind us."
"Why give them a choice? Heal now, ask forgiveness later."

screens.text: "Unfortunately, it looks like politics. We've got the will and a way to help, but a number of factions aren't so enthusiastic about accepting it."
"When you've gotten used to your damaged world, rebuilt your lives around that damage, it's hard to see changing that as an upside."
"I'm no politician either, but that's going to seriously backfire. You can't roll into town and tell people how it's going to be. That makes you conquerers, not allies."
"Diplomacy is the order of the day. We're going to show the Cardassians, the Dominion, even the Ferengi that healing these worlds is the right path forward."
